topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 2.0: Troubleshooting Freezer Services

body.p:
You can use the following logs to troubleshoot Freezer functionality:
Component Description
Freezer Client/var/log/freezer.log
Freezer Scheduler/var/log/freezer-scheduler.log
Freezer API/var/log/freezer-api.log
body.section:
The following limitations apply to the Freezer UI and the backup and restore process
Admin GUI for Backup/Restore is supported only if user logs in as "hlm_backup". All other users will see the GUI panel but it the UI will not work. (BURA-216 related)
If Backup/Restore action fails via the GUI, the user needs to check the Freezer logs to get the details for failure ( BURA -213 )
Job Status and Job Result on UI and Backend (aka CLI) are not in sync
For a given "Action" the following Modes are not supported from UI: MongoDB, Microsoft SQL Server, Cinder and Nova
